pr_title: DHFPROD-3650: Delete saved personal queries feature

timeline.bodyText: I'm of the opinion that it's perfectly fine just to toss the test of deletion onto an existing test method, like the existing createThenUpdate test. Fewer test methods means less time setting up tests, which means our test suite is faster.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.message: DHFPROD-3650: Refactoring Search API to match with SavedQueries feature
